page.title: 07THE CHURCH_PRESENT & FUTURE
page.content: A village church plays an important part in the life of the community:so St.Nicholas Church aims to be a focal point for the people of this area;a place where people can not only worship,but a place too,where people can learn to understand God & learn to understand each other.It should be a place where the community shares the joys & sorrows of life as well as meeting for the fun & interest of social activities.Here are performed the three special ceremonies of life_ baptism,marriage & death.The yearly average is Baptisms_14;Marriages_14;Burials_13. For the future,the church under the direction of its present Rector,Rev.P. Dennis,hopes to be more of a listening church,hopes to be more welcoming to strangers,more adventurous & more prepared to try new & different things
